trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
When you create an UnreferencedObjectEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 UnreferencedObjectEventHandler 委托时，需要标识处理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115) The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>事件发生仅当调用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>
